class.name: Course
class.author: Christopher Swenson
class.description: Holds a collection of language information.

constructor.return: a new Course Object. Do not instance directly, use the provided course global object.

class.property: The div to act as the canvas for course
The div to act as the skin canvas for course
An array of all the pages in the course
True/False Can shut off audio at a global level.
Is the course running in debug mode?
The absolute index of the bookmark provided by the LMS
The selected language as provided by the LMS
An object containing common text strings in multiple languages

event.name: onStringsLoaded
event.description: Fires when the langauge strings are loaded

event.name: onPageLoaded
event.description: Fires when a page has been loaded

event.name: onSkinLoaded
event.description: Fires when the skin has loaded

event.name: onPageUnload
event.description: Fires when a page is being unloaded

event.name: onStartCourse
event.description: Fires when the course has loaded and is starting

event.name: onLanguageChanged
event.description: Fires when the language has changed

method.name: loadPageByID
method.param: The id of the page to load

method.name: findPageByID
method.description: Returns a page object with the given id.

method.name: unloadPage
method.description: Unloads the current page. Do not call directly, use loadPage, loadPageByID, loadNextPage, loadPrevPage, or reloadPage() to trigger a page unload.

method.name: loadNextPage
method.description: Loads the next page in the current container, or the first page in the next container.

method.name: loadPrevPage
method.description: Loads the previous page in the current container, or the last page in the previous container.

method.name: startCourse
method.description: Starts the course. Do not call directly, it is managed by loading the index.html file

method.name: pageAvailable
method.description: Checks to see if a page is available to navigate to and will return the page or null if it doesn't exist

method.name: getTitle
method.description: Builds a single piece of text with the container and page title
method.param: How deep to dive to get the title
The seperator character to use between containers
used to pass font size information from the manifest

method.name: switchLanguage
method.description: Changes the language of the course to the given language identified by shortName
method.param: short name of the language to switch to
